mapper.select: SELECT CAL_NO, CAL_TYPE, CAL_TITLE, CAL_CONTENT, CAL_REGI_DATE, CAL_START_DATE, CAL_END_DATE, CAL_ALLDAY, CAL_STATUS, CAL_COLOR, USER_ID FROM (SELECT CAL_NO, CAL_TYPE, CAL_TITLE, CAL_CONTENT, CAL_REGI_DATE, CAL_START_DATE, CAL_END_DATE, CAL_ALLDAY, CAL_STATUS, CAL_COLOR, USER_ID FROM CALENDAR WHERE TRUNC(CAL_START_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
select cal_no, cal_type, cal_title, cal_content, cal_regi_date, cal_start_date, cal_end_date, cal_allday, cal_status, cal_color, user_id from calendar where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into calendar(cal_no, cal_type, cal_title, cal_content, cal_regi_date, cal_start_date, cal_end_date, cal_allday, cal_color, cal_status, user_id) values (cal_seq.NEXTVAL, #{cal_type}, #{cal_title}, #{cal_content}, sysdate, #{cal_start_date}, #{cal_end_date}, #{cal_allday}, #{cal_color}, #{cal_status}, #{user_id})
